RowNumber.description: The index of the record in the dataset

CreditScore.description: A measure of the customer’s creditworthiness

Geography.description: The geographical location of the customer

Tenure.description: Number of years the customer has been with the bank

Balance.description: The current balance in the customer’s account

NumOfProducts.description: Number of products the customer has

HasCrCard.description: Whether the customer has a credit card or not

value_dict.1: The customer has a credit card
value_dict.0: The customer does not have a credit card

IsActiveMember.description: Whether the customer is an active member or not

value_dict.1: The customer is an active member
value_dict.0: The customer is not an active member

EstimatedSalary.description: The estimated salary of the customer

Exited.description: Whether the customer has exited the bank or not

value_dict.1: The customer has exited the bank
value_dict.0: The customer has not exited the bank

Complain.description: Whether the customer has made any complaints or not

value_dict.1: The customer has made a complaint
value_dict.0: The customer has not made a complaint

Satisfaction Score.description: The satisfaction score given by the customer

Card Type.description: The type of card the customer has

value_dict.DIAMOND: The customer has a Diamond card
value_dict.GOLD: The customer has a Gold card
value_dict.SILVER: The customer has a Silver card
value_dict.PLATINUM: The customer has a Platinum card

Point Earned.description: The points earned by the customer

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in customer behavior analysis.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the customer, please predict if the customer has exited the bank.
prompt.answer_prompt: Has exited the bank[1] or has not exited the bank[0]?

class_value_dict.1: The customer has exited the bank
class_value_dict.0: The customer has not exited the bank

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in customer satisfaction analysis.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the customer, please predict the satisfaction score of the customer.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in customer loyalty program analysis.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the customer, please predict the points earned by the customer.
prompt.answer_prompt: How many points has the customer earned?
